name: Favorite Miner
description: Favorite Miner is another 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to pass a variety of levels playing for a digger. The digger has long been inspired by the dream that he could find at least-some jewelry. The essence of this game is very simple, after collecting a certain amount of diamonds on the level opens the passage to the temporary home of the digger, after which you will find yourself at the next level. The path of the digger is not easy, there are dangers. Be careful because you have only one chance to collect all the crystals. Think over every step, and then this platformer will not make you bored.
